statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer' AND patient_age > 50
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 101 AND age > 50;
DELETE FROM trials WHERE sponsor = 'Pfizer' AND trial_phase = 'Phase 3';
DELETE FROM TrialParticipants WHERE trial_id = 100 AND enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TrialParticipants WHERE participant_id IN (SELECT participant_id FROM TrialParticipants WHERE enrollment_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM patient_trials WHERE trial_id = 100 AND patient_id = 5;
